featureDescription.name: skip
featureDescription.description: TRUE if this item must not be linguistically processed.

typeDescription.name: org.gramlab.kwaga.unitex_uima.general.tcas.LanguageArea
typeDescription.description: Annotates a text area with a language name.

featureDescription.name: additionalOpeningTag
featureDescription.description: A text that must be added before the text's beginning before being processed by linguistic annotator.

featureDescription.name: additionalClosingTag
featureDescription.description: A text that must be added after the text's ending before being processed by linguistic annotator.

featureDescription.name: graphFilter
featureDescription.description:
A filter specifying which graphs must be applied or not applied to this language area.
Each item in the array is a graph name that is allowed to apply.
If the graph filter is null or empty, all available graphs are allowed.

featureDescription.name: graphNegativeFilter
featureDescription.description: Graphs described here must not be applied on this language area.
